mapper.sql: ID, MER_CODE, MER_NAME, ORDER_SN, CUST_NO, TXN_DATE, TXN_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMT, EXPEND_POINT, EXPEND_AMT, ITEM_ID, ADVICE_PRICE, RESERVED, PAYMENT_METHOD, POINT_SET_MARK, TX_DT, CREATE_TIME, ORG
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from TRADE_FILE_DATA
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TRADE_FILE_DATA (ID, MER_CODE, MER_NAME, ORDER_SN, CUST_NO, TXN_DATE, TXN_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMT, EXPEND_POINT, EXPEND_AMT, ITEM_ID, ADVICE_PRICE, RESERVED, PAYMENT_METHOD, POINT_SET_MARK, TX_DT, CREATE_TIME, ORG) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expendPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expendAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advicePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserved,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pointSetMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

MER_CODE = #{record.merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
